name: introduction-to-yaml
description: YAML is a data language writable and readable by humans. Learn it here !

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:arthurlacoste/Introduction-To-YAML gh-pages --force

author: Arthur Lacoste <arthak@gmail.com>
